wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Pargeter is the nom-de-plume used by a popular writer of 50 romance novels in Mills & Boon from 1975 to 1986. No information exists as to the true identity or identities of the writer(s) who employed this pen name.

response: *Winds From The Sea / Island of Darkness / Wind River (1979) (with Margaret Pargeter and Rebecca Stratton)
*Reluctant Neighbor / Never Go Back / Island Masquerade (1983) (with Sheila Douglas, Margaret Pargeter)
*Desert Castle / Collision Course / Ride A Black Horse (1980) (with Isobel Chace and Margaret Pargeter)
*Margaret Pargeter, nom de plume for a popular writer of romance novels from 1975 to 1986
